rows.label: tev000195_MSG0001
rows.name: Hello, [ST:playername ]. Forgive my intrusion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0002
rows.name:
I was feeling a bit peckish, and hoped there might be
something to eat in here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0003
rows.name: Alas, it appears I was mistaken.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0004
rows.name:
Heading out to the commercial district hardly seems
worth the bother. Perhaps a nice conversation would
sate my hunger instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0005
rows.name:
So, [ST:playername ], tell meâ€”
now that you have some field experience under
your belt, what type of missions do you prefer?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_JNK0010
rows.name: Wildlife Assaults

rows.label: tev000195_SEL0011
rows.name: Hunting down and defeating indigens.

rows.label: tev000195_JNK0020
rows.name: Trailblazing Missions

rows.label: tev000195_SEL0021
rows.name: Installing data probes at FrontierNav probe sites.

rows.label: tev000195_JNK0030
rows.name: Recovery Missions

rows.label: tev000195_SEL0031
rows.name: Reclaiming debris from the White Whale.

rows.label: tev000195_JNK0040
rows.name: R&D Missions

rows.label: tev000195_SEL0041
rows.name: Testing new weapons for arms manufacturers.

rows.label: tev000195_JNK0050
rows.name: Investigative Missions

rows.label: tev000195_SEL0051
rows.name: Learning more about Mira.

rows.label: tev000195_JNK0060
rows.name: Peacekeeping Missions

rows.label: tev000195_SEL0061
rows.name: Patrolling New LA and resolving citizens' problems.

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0006
rows.name: Interesting. I might have guessed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0007
rows.name:
I would very much enjoy having the freedom to choose
missions the way you do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0008
rows.name:
Chausson and Vandham would berate me for saying
so, but I often find my role as defense secretary to be
a frustrating one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0009
rows.name:
Do you remember when we found that piece of the
Lifehold in northern Primordia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0010
rows.name:
It takes at least half a day to get a team organized
and deployed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0011
rows.name:
Mainly because each team already has its own missions
to take care of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0012
rows.name:
When we need to dispatch a team quickly, we mostly
have to rely on BLADE operatives that have only just
returned from a deployment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0013
rows.name:
And that means we have to get all their damaged
equipment turned around and ready to go,
which is a difficult way to operate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0014
rows.name:
That wasn't the first time we discovered a piece of the
Lifehold only to see it destroyed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0015
rows.name:
When first we located it, I was determined to secure it
no matter what the cost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0016
rows.name: I couldn't wait a single moment longer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0017
rows.name:
I pulled in what available BLADE operatives I could,
but the operation was slipshod from the start.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0018
rows.name: And my rash decisions led to their untimely demise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0019
rows.name:
But when your team came to save us, I realized
something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0020
rows.name:
A small team of elite BLADEs can respond more
effectively to emergency missions than a large
deployment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0021
rows.name:
That's why, whenever I long to participate in a field
mission, I always turn to your team first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0022
rows.name:
Heh. And what do you think about that, hmm?
I'm being preposterous, I know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0023
rows.name: But I do expect great things from you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0024
rows.name:
After all, your team has become the cornerstone of
BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000195_MSG0025
rows.name:
In any case, I must be getting back to BLADE Tower.
I believe I just remembered where the director general
hides his snacks...[ST:wait ]
